mtrokpbqikxu.body:
□(426, 263)
Start | []
Draw     Window | []
Create   Var | [wait,5]
Jump | [createVars]
□(1384, 425)
Trigger | [update]
Jump | [render]
Trigger | [render_return]
Jump | [loop]
Trigger | [loop_return]
Jump If > | [paddle1,by,paddle1y]
Trigger | [paddle1_return]
Jump If < | [paddle2,by,paddle2y]
Trigger | [paddle2_return]
Jump If > | [,by,screen]
Jump If < | [,by,0]
Jump | [movePaddle2]
Trigger | [movePaddle2_return]
Wait | [wait]
Jump | [update]
□(512, 142)
Trigger | [createVars]
Create   Var | [bx,200]
Create   Var | [by,200]
Create   Var | [bvx,0]
Create   Var | [bvy,0]
Create   Var | [bsize,10]
Comment | [Ball Variables]
□(1385, 157)
Trigger | [render]
Clear | []
Set Color | [gray]
Draw Square | [0,0,screen]
Set Color | [black]
Clone Var | [bsize_halved,bsize]
Multiply Vars | [bsize_halved,0.5]
Clone Var | [tempx,bx]
Clone Var | [tempy,by]
Subtract Vars | [tempx,bsize_halved]
Subtract Vars | [tempy,bsize_halved]
Draw Square | [tempx,tempy,bsize]
Clone Var | [psizex_halved,paddlesizex]
Clone Var | [psizey_halved,paddlesizey]
Multiply Vars | [psizex_halved,0.5]
Multiply Vars | [psizey_halved,0.5]
Clone Var | [px,paddle1x]
Clone Var | [py,paddle1y]
Subtract Vars | [px,psizex_halved]
Subtract Vars | [py,psizey_halved]
Draw Rect | [px,py,paddlesizex,paddlesizey]
Clone Var | [px,paddle2x]
Clone Var | [py,paddle2y]
Subtract Vars | [px,psizex_halved]
Subtract Vars | [py,psizey_halved]
Draw Rect | [px,py,paddlesizex,paddlesizey]
Jump | [render_return]
□(1433, 258)
Comment | [Render]
□(1403, 712)
Trigger | [loop]
Add Vars | [bx,bvx]
Add Vars | [by,bvy]
Jump If > | [notLeft,bx,0]
Multiply Vars | [bvx,-1]
Trigger | [notLeft]
Jump If < | [notRight,bx,screen]
Multiply Vars | [bvx,-1]
Trigger | [notRight]
Jump | [loop_return]
□(1432, 623)
Comment | [Main game              loop]
□(1680, 809)
Comment | [left and right bouncing]
□(512, 62)
Trigger | [createVars]
Create   Var | [gray,gray]
Create   Var | [screen,400]
Create   Var | [0,0]
Create   Var | [black,black]
Create   Var | [0.5,0.5]
Create   Var | [-1,-1]
Create   Var | [started,0]
Create   Var | [2,8]
Jump | [update]
Comment | [General Variables]
□(510, -17)
Trigger | [createVars]
Create   Var | [paddlesizex,100]
Create   Var | [paddlesizey,10]
Create   Var | [paddle1x,100]
Create   Var | [paddle1y,370]
Create   Var | [paddle2x,100]
Create   Var | [paddle2y,30]
□(440, 495)
On Draw Mouse | []
Clone Var | [paddle1x,mouseX]
Jump If =  | [start,started,0]
□(1407, 917)
Trigger | [paddle1]
Clone Var | [psizex_halved,paddlesizex]
Multiply Vars | [psizey_halved,0.5]
Clone Var | [left,paddle1x]
Clone Var | [right,paddle1x]
Add Vars | [right,psizex_halved]
Subtract Vars | [left,psizex_halved]
Jump If < | [paddle1_return,bx,left]
Jump If > | [paddle1_return,bx,right]
Multiply Vars | [bvy,-1]
Set Rand | [rand]
Subtract Vars | [rand,0.5]
Multiply Vars | [rand,2]
Add Vars | [bvx,rand]
Multiply Vars | [rand,2]
Jump | [paddle1_return]
□(1407, 1007)
Trigger | [paddle2]
Clone Var | [psizex_halved,paddlesizex]
Multiply Vars | [psizey_halved,0.5]
Clone Var | [left,paddle2x]
Clone Var | [right,paddle2x]
Add Vars | [right,psizex_halved]
Subtract Vars | [left,psizex_halved]
Jump If < | [paddle2_return,bx,left]
Jump If > | [paddle2_return,bx,right]
Multiply Vars | [bvy,-1]
Set Rand | [rand]
Subtract Vars | [rand,0.5]
Multiply Vars | [rand,2]
Add Vars | [bvx,rand]
Multiply Vars | [rand,2]
Jump | [paddle2_return]
□(1412, 1192)
Trigger | [movePaddle2]
Clone Var | [x,paddle2x]
Subtract Vars | [x,bx]
Jump If =  | [movePaddle2_return,started,0]
Jump If > | [movePaddle2_left,x,0]
Jump If < | [movePaddle2_right,x,0]
□(1592, 1104)
Comment | [AI]
□(1467, 1384)
Trigger | [movePaddle2_left]
Create   Var | [AI speed,-3]
Add Vars | [paddle2x,AI speed]
Jump | [movePaddle2_return]
□(1467, 1474)
Trigger | [movePaddle2_right]
Create   Var | [AI speed,3]
Add Vars | [paddle2x,AI speed]
Jump | [movePaddle2_return]
□(1575, 1295)
Comment | [AI movement]
□(2265, 562)
Trigger | []
Print Primitive | [End!]
□(473, 410)
Comment | [User Input]
□(530, 613)
Trigger | [start]
Create   Var | [bvx,5]
Create   Var | [bvy,8]
Create   Var | [started,1]
mtrokpbqikxu.name: Pong
